short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click to call for Amazon Connect. Brought to you by ConnectPath, the fully featured CX Manager for Amazon Connect.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost outbound productivity by initiating calls when clicking phone numbers on any chrome window and/or tab. Support for US and International phone numbers. Works with default Amazon Connect CCP,  ConnectPath and other Custom CCP implementations.
